sentences.en: As times alter , men's affections change.
Diet and exercise will alter your shape.
sentences.cn: 节食和锻炼会改变你的体形。

sentences.en: He is unlikely to alter his game plan.
sentences.cn: 他不大可能改变自己的策略。

sentences.en: Her face hadn’t altered much over the years.
sentences.cn: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.en: I don't imagine that we can alter anything in our own lifetime.
sentences.cn: 我还想不出来,我们这辈子变得了什么事.

sentences.en: If your new coat is too large, a tailor can alter it to fit you.
sentences.cn: 你的大衣要是太大，裁缝能把它改得合你身。

sentences.en: In doing translation, one should not alter the meaning of the original to suit one's own taste.
sentences.cn: 翻译时不应根据自己的好恶改变原文的意思.

sentences.en: It was the suggestion that he might alter course to win an election that really nettled him.
sentences.cn: 是那条让他改变策略以赢得选举的建议惹恼了他。

sentences.en: It would be sacrilege to alter the composer's original markings.
sentences.cn: 改动作曲家原有的符号是亵渎行为。

sentences.en: It's a little chunk of history that they've forgotten to alter.
sentences.cn: 这小块历史,他们忘了改掉啦.

sentences.en: Nothing can alter the fact that the refugees are our responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我们有责任帮助难民，这一事实无法改变。

sentences.en: Processing and storage also may alter plant vitamin content.
sentences.cn: 加工和贮藏也会改变作物中维生素的含量.

sentences.en: She is trying to alter the coat.
She was about to alter the trimmings of the dress.
sentences.cn: 她打算改动这件女服的装饰.

sentences.en: The city centre has altered beyond recognition (=  changed very much  ) .
sentences.cn: 市中心变得都认不出来了。

sentences.en: The current division of labor between workers and management will alter.
sentences.cn: 当前工人与管理部门的分工将会改变。

sentences.en: We have to alter the house into a barn.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不把房子改建成谷仓.

words.tran_cn: （趋于）改变的；变质的；使体质逐渐康复的；有改变体质作用的
为参加短程高速汽车赛而改装的赛车

phrases.tran_cn: n. 密友；个性的另一面；至交

trans.tran_cn: (Alter)人名；(英)奥尔特；(德、捷、葡、爱沙、立陶、拉脱、俄、西、罗、瑞典)阿尔特

trans.tran_en: to change, or to make someone or something change

trans.tran_cn: 改变， 变更， 变动
trans.tran_en: to change, or to make someone or something change
